summary: Comprehensive testing of DarWinSymbiont enhanced features including navigation improvements, data consistency checking, and context-aware business proposals. Most enhanced features are working correctly with some integration issues.

timeout_issues.issue: Request timeout after 90 seconds during LaTeX generation
Request timeout after 60 seconds during applications generation

api_errors.issue: Returns 500 error when invalid runId provided (e.g., 'results')
api_errors.impact: Consistency check fails on results page without valid runId

upload_integration.issue: Upload API call fails with net::ERR_FILE_NOT_FOUND

navigation_issues.issue: Home button not found in expected location for confirmation modal testing

missing_features.issue: Provenance icons not visible on results page during direct navigation

passed_tests: API Health Check - Backend connectivity working
PDF Upload API - File upload endpoint functional
LLM Summarize API - Text summarization working
LLM Problem Analysis API - Problem extraction working
LLM Compare API - Study comparison working
LLM Improve API - Improvement suggestions working
DWS Simulation Run API - Evolutionary simulation working
DWS Summary API - Run status retrieval working
Context-Aware Business Proposals API - Generated 8 proposals successfully
Data Consistency Check API - Working with valid runId
Performance Comparison API - Generated comparison with verdict
Top Navigation Bar - Home button and theme toggle present
Theme Toggle Functionality - Dark/light mode switching working
Enhanced Stepper - All 6 workflow steps visible
Back Navigation - Back button functional and working
Business Applications Page - Context-aware proposals displayed
Navigation State Persistence - Browser history management working
action_item_for_E1: Fix upload API integration issue (net::ERR_FILE_NOT_FOUND) and reduce LLM API timeout issues. The enhanced navigation, theme toggle, business proposals, and data consistency features are working well. Upload workflow needs debugging for full end-to-end testing.

working_enhanced_features: Top navigation bar with home button (üè†) and theme toggle (üåô)
Theme toggle functionality - successfully switches between light/dark modes
Enhanced stepper showing all 6 workflow steps (Upload ‚Üí Analyze ‚Üí Simulate ‚Üí Compare ‚Üí Results ‚Üí Business)
Back navigation functionality - 'Back to Previous Step' button working
Context-aware business proposals API generating 8 relevant proposals
Data consistency checking API working with proper runId validation
Performance comparison API generating verdicts and comparison tables
Business applications page displaying real-world use cases
Navigation state persistence through browser history
partially_working_features: Provenance tooltips - Icons present in code but not always visible during navigation
Inconsistency banners - Infrastructure present but not triggered during testing
Home navigation confirmation modals - Home button present but modal not triggered
integration_issues: File upload workflow broken due to API routing issue
Some LLM endpoints timing out during heavy processing
Direct page navigation works but workflow navigation has issues
